name: Salvation (MIShanto)
description:
**This is a BrainStation Jam Submission**

"Salvation" is an adventure game where the player needs to save the world from the Devil. This world is rotting day by day and evil is constantly taking control over everything. 

Storyline: 

There was a time when the world was full of chaos. Destruction was an inevitable thing. All the good peoples decided to save the world from the devil. To achieve this, they drew maximum power from devil into 4 mysterious stones. These stones kept protected in a place where good peoples are guarding them. 

After many years, the Devil started to influence people to cause destruction again. Here comes our protagonist. He thought, by using devils power he can eradicate the existence of devil. 

The player will bond with devil and do harm to good peoples in order to save the world.  

This journey will be full of thrills and Unpredictable twists.  Player controls: 

Move left = A 

Move right = D 

Jump = Space

 Fire = Right Ctrl
